select response_id,
from response_copy
response_id = #{responseId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
demand_id = #{demandId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
intentionMoneyState = #{intentionmoneystate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
whetherHosting = #{whetherhosting,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
whetherNavigation = #{whethernavigation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
releaseSelected = #{releaseselected,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
responseSelected = #{responseselected,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
demandType = #{demandtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
releaseTime = #{releasetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dpt_state = #{dptState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dpt = #{dpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dpt_ct = #{dptCt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dpt_acceptNearAirport = #{dptAcceptnearairport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dpt_timeResources = #{dptTimeresources,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
dpt_time = #{dptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pst_state = #{pstState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pst = #{pst,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pst_ct = #{pstCt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pst_acceptNearAirport = #{pstAcceptnearairport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pst_timeResources = #{pstTimeresources,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
pst_time = #{pstTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
arrv_state = #{arrvState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
arrv = #{arrv,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
arrv_ct = #{arrvCt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
arrv_acceptNearAirport = #{arrvAcceptnearairport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
arrv_timeResources = #{arrvTimeresources,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
arrv_time = #{arrvTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
airCrftTyp = #{aircrfttyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
days = #{days,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
blockBidPrice = #{blockbidprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
loadFactorsExpect = #{loadfactorsexpect,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
avgGuestExpect = #{avgguestexpect,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
subsidyPolicy = #{subsidypolicy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
sailingTime = #{sailingtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
seating = #{seating,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
capacityCompany = #{capacitycompany,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
capacityBase = #{capacityBase,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
scheduling = #{scheduling,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
schedulinePort = #{schedulineport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
hoursCost = #{hourscost,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
publicWay = #{publicway,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
directionalGoal = #{directionalgoal,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
fltNbr = #{fltnbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
iHome = #{ihome,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
responseDate = #{responsedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
updateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
newInfo = #{newinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
responseProgress = #{responseProgress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

select response_id,
from response_copy
employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
demand_id = #{demandId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and
ORDER BY STR_TO_DATE(updateDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') DESC LIMIT 1
